metadata.title: CVE-2013-7074 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Content EditingWizards in TYPO3 4.5.x before 4.5.32, 4.7.x before 4.7.17, 6.0.x before6.0.12, 6.1.x before 6.1.7, and the development versions of 6.2 allowremote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viaunspecified parameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.32+dfsg1-1').
